select sku.name,com.real_name,com.wx_head_img,sku.id as skuId,com.id from pf_border pb INNER JOIN pf_border_recommen_reward pbrr ON pb.id=pbrr.pf_border_id INNER JOIN com_sku sku ON sku.id = pbrr.sku_id INNER JOIN com_user com ON com.id = pbrr.recommen_user_id WHERE pb.user_pid=#{userId} AND pb.pay_status=1

select sku.name,com.real_name,com.wx_head_img,sku.id as skuId,com.id,agent.name as agentName from pf_user_recommen_relation pbrr INNER JOIN com_sku sku ON sku.id = pbrr.sku_id INNER JOIN com_user com ON com.id = pbrr.user_id INNER JOIN pf_user_sku user_sku ON pbrr.user_id = user_sku.user_id AND pbrr.sku_id = user_sku.sku_id INNER JOIN com_agent_level agent ON user_sku.agent_level_id = agent.id where pbrr.user_pid = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.recommen_user_id) FROM pf_border a INNER JOIN pf_border_recommen_reward b ON a.id=b.pf_border_id WHERE a.user_pid = #{userId} AND a.pay_status=1
